website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for a compact Android handset, the LG Optimus F3 will satisfy prepaid customers. As an on-contract phone, however, look to other free smartphones that are better.
pros: The LG Optimus F3 is inexensive with or without a carrier contract, has long-lasting battery life, and comes with Google’s TalkBack feature for the visually impaired
cons: The Optimus F3 showed inconsistent 4G data performance and call quality was mediocre

customer_reviews.title: Super annoying though because in one week he was late ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a surprise for my huband because he was constantly complaining about his previous phone. He immediately said he thought it was too small and tried it for about 3 days before he went back to the other phone. He used that until it broke. He has consistently been using this now for over a week and the alarm simply does not sound, through some simple Googling, it appears this is common. Super annoying though because in one week he was late twice. Not impressed by the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: LG Optimus F3
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for getting it to me fast, but the phone in obsolete. Just over internal storage or lack there of. Just not capable of operating correctly, can't handle apps and updates. I bought it for a quick fix, when I broke my screen on another phone. Getting ready to go back to broken screen phone for the time being.. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Butler

customer_reviews.title: LG Optimus F3 received in pristine condition!
customer_reviews.text: The cell phone was in pristine condition. But, without the instruction book, I was at a loss. At times the cell is too sensitive to touch and other times, you can hit with a sledge hammer and it won't budge. I have tried several times to program it for my emails, but I have given up for a while then I will try again. My connectivity may have something to do with the malfunctions. I guess, since I am mostly on WiFi, I cannot expect much. Thanks, this will do nicely until my next.
customer_reviews.author: Nilsy

customer_reviews.title: ... my husband because I have the same phone and love it. But his almost never gets a signal ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my husband because I have the same phone and love it. But his almost never gets a signal -so it's worthless. Same phone as mine, same carrier & coverage, same plan. Go figure. VERY frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Pheasant

customer_reviews.title: I loved LG phones up until this one
customer_reviews.text: I loved LG phones up until this one. This thing barely has any memory and the memory it does have fills up rather quickly. Also it won't take an SD card so your basically screwed. Once your memory starts filling up the phone slows to a crawl. I advise you to look for another phone.
customer_reviews.author: Creature

customer_reviews.title: No room, SD cards are pointless
customer_reviews.text: I hate it! Why have a sd card slot, if u can't move anything? Can only have one app and had to disable everything! Only good thing is the camera and the speed. But make sure to back up pics and delete them, or you will run out of room. Gonna go buy the cheap 49 cheap zte awe phone again. that phone was awesome (except for the camera)
customer_reviews.author: Misty Rain

customer_reviews.title: It's garbage. Virgin spams you with ads for useless apps
customer_reviews.text: It's garbage. Virgin spams you with ads for useless apps, and even installs some for you without permission. There's only about 1GB of free storage which fills up constantly. I have to go through and delete stuff just to make room for text messages and emails. Get a different phone and save yourself a huge headache.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cozzens

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smart phone. I have found it easy to use and love it. As for complaints about storage, I haven't experienced that. I have downloaded a few app's and still have almost 1 gb left. As for battery, used it a lot yesterday including the gps. Did some surfing and texting and still had 77% battery life left after 9 hours. It also charges very quickly less than 30 minutes. Now my wife is going to get the same. Virgin coverage was great on our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool and stuff - just don't expect good memory capacity!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone - it's sleek and fast and all that good stuff. I've never felt the need to have an iphone or anything, so if you're looking for a smartphone that still isn't too expensive, this is the thing for you. The only thing I can say about it is that its storage is pretty crappy. I only have my social media apps installed, and I still have to clear my cache several times a day in order for my phone to function. If there's any way to expand the internal memory on my phone, I would love to know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute phone
customer_reviews.text: its cute very simple to use not that much storage so I do recommend buying a bigger sd card its was also shipped by ontrac I am very pleased I heard so many bad reviews about them.the van they drive is unappealing and dirty I thought it was random van parking In my lot and I see my pacakage on the dashboard and a really nice Hispanic guy com out and and put the package neatly on my front porch.so sorry ontrac and they took care of my package
customer_reviews.author: simplyAl

customer_reviews.title: Good no-frills phone, nice size, horrible memory
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this 5 stars for the light, compact size and intuitive user interface. But the memory is sooooo small. This phone has only 1.24 GB of memory and refuses to let me use the 32 GB micro SD card I installed. Lots of other users have this same problem. ... That aside, it otherwise works reliably and is a handy pocketable size.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Yamaguchi

customer_reviews.title: Good smart phone learner
customer_reviews.text: Good phone to learn the smart phone technology for a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.author: NBA Films

customer_reviews.title: Basic Smartphone
customer_reviews.text: I just graduated from a dumbphone. This is my first smartphone and I didn't know how unconnected I was. I ordered two of these. One had a blown speaker on the speakerphone so I returned it. Amazon replaced it before I could even ship it out. But that's how great Amazon's customer service is. The only thing I miss is more memory. I have an SD card in it but not all of the apps will fully transfer to it. I wish the phone had more space but for the price, it's a good phone.
customer_reviews.author: McTellem

customer_reviews.title: Cannot save apps to SD card, Nice phone overall
customer_reviews.text: it is a nice phone but over all for people that like to have a tone of apps on there phones...... its sucks. There is no way to save apps to SD card so it does not take long for it to fill up and every time you go to get an app or update one it will say low storage cannot install. If you are just a texter phone and talking its great for basics, but if you like alot of apps, THIS IS NOT THE PHONE FOR YOU.
customer_reviews.author: SunglassSmiles

customer_reviews.title: Choose your apps wisely
customer_reviews.text: -1 star for only one reason: can't move apps to SD card without rooting phone. It's fairly simple to do if you know what you're doing, but still feels like an unnecessary step for such a simple function.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chambers, Author

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...No Storage
customer_reviews.text: This phone has 1GB of storage. and it is incredibly difficult (to almost impossible to move apps to your SD card. I would not have bought this phone if I knew I would always be out of storage. On the positive side it is a decent smartphone with all the trappings but unfortunately you aren't able to use it much because of the storage issue. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: E Celestin

customer_reviews.title: A Great Phone For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This is an overall Its snappygreat phone for the price. The screen is a bit small, but that's fine. Its quite snappy, but lags with heavy gaming. The LTE is FAST. This phone is IMPOSSIBLE TO UNLOCK, but easily rootable. Update: I dropped my phone in a puddle and it stopped working. Well, It wasn't waterproof, It was good while it lasted. I will get the Blu Studio C mini as a replacement
customer_reviews.author: ZZI

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from HTC EVO. Difference is night and day.
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty snappy and the Lg version of the OS is decent. Comes w/ swype as a default app which may be a boon to some. Easy to root. Could be way better if the default ram was 2Gb instead of 1. I had to root and monkey with storage because it is not SD card friendly with moving apps to SD. There is some lame restriction of 1Gb of 8 only for app storage. I feel LG is lagging with Android support. Kitkat would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Batou

customer_reviews.title: Decent phone - low internal memory
customer_reviews.text: Good phone with good battery life. Internal memory is lacking. I did not comprehend just how small the space is until I started downloading a few apps. The phone is fast enough for my needs but without the ability to easily move apps to the memory card I will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: So its kind of like I paid 80 dollars for this phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone's headphone port broke within 2 months of receiving it so virgin mobile replaced it for a further 25 dollars. So its kind of like I paid 80 dollars for this phone. I knew there was problems with the sound before since the 'S' sound in songs sounded damaged. In addition, this phone has very little storage. Its a nice phone otherwise and maybe it won't break for you so if you don't care too much about storage (I can fit like..5 apps on it before it runs out of space) than it is a good phone for you.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Got what I expected on time and as described
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent entry/mid level android device, feels really light and not sturdy. would suggest a case as I don't think it would take drops very well. There is one improvement needed and that is to be able to move apps to sd card, which can be done if you root the phone overall got what I expected no complaints. Sound quality is 8/10, Battery life is really good 9/10, and screen display about 6/10, with signal and lte service 7/10 on vrigin mobile aka sprint network.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: So far not too happy. Bought for my son
customer_reviews.text: So far not too happy . Bought for my son. Seems to not have enough memory for texting etc. So am disappointed as this was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Bought as an upgrade/replacement to LG Optimus V
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the V, this phone is AMAZING however, yes - there are quite a few much better phones out there. I got this for my wife who only uses her phone for things like 'Words with Friends' and texting pictures, so this was great. And cheap - at only $150 when I got it for the Virgin month - month no contract, it was right what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: SM_TJ_S

customer_reviews.title: LG Optimus
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone!!! It isn't too big, but big enough, it fits very nicely in my hand (unlike those big bulky popular phones). I don't do a lot of talking on it but do text and play games. I like it's sleek look and its battery life is ok. I charge it about once every other day. The displace is pretty and I like how the apps are setup.
customer_reviews.author: Logdog

customer_reviews.title: Great overall cheap smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, it gave me all of the upgrades I wanted for way less then what most phones cost. Sadly though virgin mobile does limit their overall space to less then 2gb, but the camera is clear and its easy to use android platform make it a great overall cheap phone.
customer_reviews.author: runninghorses18

customer_reviews.title: love my new phone
customer_reviews.text: Never had an android phone before, but this is the bomb. I am still figuring out new things to do with it. I sometimes forget that I have a laptop and do all my stuff on it. great phone; great battery life; and clear screen
customer_reviews.author: sammo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised for a "value" phone. Bought for my wife since she is very hard on phones and often breaks them within a few months. She ended up breaking this one as well, but at this price it didn't really matter.
customer_reviews.author: Casual Runner

customer_reviews.title: They would be happy to repair the "software failure" at my cost but ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone quit working after 6 months. It would not turn on, charge or operate. I returned the phone to LG only to find out they don't honor Amazon documentation as proof of purchase which voids any warranty support. They would be happy to repair the "software failure" at my cost but they declared it out of warranty due to lack of a receipt. Be aware. If you need warranty coverage don't buy LG here.
customer_reviews.author: douglas r. watson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Old product that works great, this phone work better than the original one I owned, I could never get the extended memory to work.
customer_reviews.author: H. L.

customer_reviews.title: This phone is horrible if you enjoy apps
customer_reviews.text: WARNING. This phone is horrible if you enjoy apps. I was only able to have 3 apps at a time. It is annoying to have to delete and keep adding apps when you want a different one. Horrible memory.

customer_reviews.title: What a Bargain!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: low price, compact size, lightweight, fast 4G LTE speeds, excellent graphics, Google Now Con's: Virgin Mobile (Sprint) doesn't have the fastest networks I don't know of any other good quality 4G phones you can get for $90.00.
customer_reviews.author: db2000

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The service provider sells this for almost $70 more and its the same phone. Works great, very lightweight. The sound quality is better than any phone I have had in the past. I bought two, and have unfortunately dropped mine several times but it has held up through the wear and tear without a case.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life, nice phone, no group texting on Virgin Mobile/Sprint network
customer_reviews.text: I've been pleased overall with the phone and VM service. Coverage is limited to most urban areas and interstates in South Carolina. This plan cut my costs by over half. However I wasn't aware that the Virgin Mobile/Sprint network doesn't support group texting.
customer_reviews.author: mandopickr

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this phone
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that the phone was going to be as small as it was, I didn't know that it would not scroll down, unfortunately I lost all the information to send it back, not a happy camper, but you live and learn, was very disappointed in this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Batie

customer_reviews.title: phone is signed on thru virgin mobile, hangs up ...
customer_reviews.text: phone is signed on thru virgin mobile, hangs up every minute or so, makes you continually call back. Amzon would not take it back as a return. do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL NORTHUP

customer_reviews.title: I love my new Optimus F3
customer_reviews.text: So far I love my new Optimus F3. I upgraded to the LG Optimus F3 from the LG Optimus Elite. It was truly a worthwhile upgrade. Best parts I like about the Optimus F3 is that it have a more powerful processor, more RAM memory, a larger screen, a newer version of jellybean and a front and rear camera. All these new feature gave me no regrets about dropping my Elite for the F3. The Optimus F3 have given me a totally new smartphone experience. Everything downloads faster, all applications load and operate faster and everything looks better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How is this an improvement?
customer_reviews.text: why make it impossible to store apps on external memory without rooting? counter-intuitive changes to gps/directions incompatible with all my bluetooth extras froze/lost connection all around town went back to my Elite
customer_reviews.author: LMG

customer_reviews.title: It's a terrific phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It's a terrific phone for the price. I mainly use it for music and navigation in the car, texting, internet surfing and a few other apps. Battery life is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: OHmom

customer_reviews.title: Great cost, great functions
customer_reviews.text: Great cost, great functions, a practical phone for a practical person not a latest, greatest, biggest, tech freak, but everything you would need from a smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: good low cost phone
customer_reviews.text: good low cost phone. Only thing that I don't like is the small storage space. I put in a external SD card, but for some reason this version of android does not let you install apps to the SC card.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.

customer_reviews.title: No memory
customer_reviews.text: I have had the previous versions of the optimus and they have all had downfalls but only upgraded because they got too old for apps. You cant put apps on this one because the internal memory is too small and Im basically ready to throw this out the window. 2 stars because battery life is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: konre

customer_reviews.title: After a few months, it stoped recieving msgs on ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, it stoped recieving msgs on time, sometimes I get them up to two days late, same with my sent messages...it's too bad
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great phone Great Price~ Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This phone is awesome all the reviews are right on - the only thing is the battery life - its not 'that' great i still have to charge it daily - but other than that its amazing i am so glad i bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Great Unexpensive Phone!!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying a LG phone. Got it for a great price and well worth it. I like that it`s 3G and 4G. I love the front and back facing camera. What I don`t like is the picture quality, especially when taking night photos. It`s kinda poor. Plus the audio is not loud at all when watching videos or listening to music. You also can`t move apps to a sd card, only video, music and your photos which is very disappointing. All and all, it`s a good phone for what it`s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa L.

customer_reviews.title: no phone for me
customer_reviews.text: I could not use this phone because it still was attached to another account
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the cell so far and no issues other than ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the cell so far and no issues other than the battery drains quicker if you don't power off which you should not have to do. I surf very little on my cell. Other than that it's a great cellphone.
customer_reviews.author: the avenger

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight phone with good battery life and quickly processes demanding apps like Navigation. I'm still not a huge fan of Virgin Mobile but the phone itself is 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone is awesome but there was a silver cardboard in the box that said for a good time call Richard and had a phone number.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Justice

customer_reviews.title: Storage issues...
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this phone except for one thing... I cannot readily move any apps to the memory card. So it quickly runs out of storage space and you have to delete apps in order to download new ones. I purchased a 32gb memory card and other than my pictures and some music, it's over 3/4 empty. There may be a way to move apps to the sd card but it sure isn't easy for someone like me to do. Will not be buying this phone again for that single reason.
customer_reviews.author: J. BRADEN

customer_reviews.title: Cell Phone
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with this phone. Our son has one and was liking it, so we ordered each of us one. Very please with shipping and was here before the actual date. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Fornshil

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone
customer_reviews.text: Our family has 3 of them. Plenty of app storage, durable, and quick. If you are looking for a phone with a sharp reasonably sized screen with plenty of processing power to back it up, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Smartphone!
customer_reviews.text: Never owned an LG smartphone before....that said, it will not be my last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LG Optimus F3
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone a little smaller than I thought it would be but is awesome. Could not be happier the price was great all though saw it at radio shack a week later for 69.99 I guess it pays to wait and shop around. Prices are usually great at amazon was disappointed when I saw the radio shack price. Radio shack is usually so much higher.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad little phone for the money. Could use more storage space.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gengler

customer_reviews.title: nice cell phone
customer_reviews.text: This cell phone will be use only for Virgin mobile. Thanks. you can go ahead and get one day. If you do need one
customer_reviews.author: Kokouvi Agle

customer_reviews.title: LG Optimus F3
customer_reviews.text: I've just recently upgraded from a Kyocera Rise to this LG Optimus 3. I love the battery life, as well as the functionality of the device. The only thing I'm kinda iffy on is the fact that there's not too much storage on the device. I've bought a SD card for the phone to place music and such on it. To me it's an upgrade. One thing that annoys me though is the small LG keyboard. Other than those, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Bartlett

customer_reviews.title: and LG customer service turned out the worst ever.
customer_reviews.text: the SD memory card slot is not working. and LG customer service turned out the worst ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone. Delivered in timely manner. Was great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Christy Love

customer_reviews.title: good phone
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent upgrade for anyone with the HTC EVO V or 3D. The OS isn't so bloated with crapware and the battery life is awesome. I can go two days on a charge instead of 9 hours like my old phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael VanderHart

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bang for the buck. The features I need (4G, good call sound quality, decent screen size) for 1/5 or 1/6 the price of the top of the line phones.
customer_reviews.author: Brian N.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU LIKE ALOT OF APPS
customer_reviews.text: honestly this phone is junk. theres no sd card usability with an 8gig phone so guess what you really cant do s*** unless you root the phone..
customer_reviews.author: jakob

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone! I've had my shares of phones that were fancy in the last decade, but this is the best phone I've bought. The battery life is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: a must have
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome it processes fast great resolution excellent camera and delivery was spot on very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: USMCninja

customer_reviews.title: Good balanced Android phone
customer_reviews.text: I ordered ths phone as a Christmas present for my wife. Scored a home run. This phone has more tech features than my rooted HTC Evo 3D. We even get 4G LTE in our rural area. It's lightweight, not to big, touch screen is very sensitive, processor speed is fast. Thinking about getting one for myself. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Good solid phone.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well, many features that I have not discovered yet. 4G when available. Best contract price on the Sprint network.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Urbanowicz

customer_reviews.title: LG Optimus F3 - A great deal!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of bang for the buck with this model. Computers come with a less detailed manual and you are unlikely to use all of the features provided, but....It is now getting harder to find as it has been superseded by another model - but it is worth searching for - especially if it can be had for under $80!
customer_reviews.author: RH Andersen

customer_reviews.title: great service from Amazon products
customer_reviews.text: Was good value and helps me accomplish lots of stuff. The product was in great condition as promised and so far, now a month, i haven't experienced any anomaly. Also am always impressed with the way Amazon ships its product, one of the fastest shipper i have dealt with. I can give them a plus five star. I love transacting business with Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Francis Ogutu

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, good size and power
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this phone (one of the main reason why I bought it). It's one of those compact size phone that you rarely see or find these day. The screen resolution is nice, phone speed is good, sound is also very clear. The only problem with this phone is that it doesn't allow you to send app to sd card without rooting the phone (not a big problem imo)
customer_reviews.author: Tan Le

customer_reviews.title: Great Phones t
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and features, easy to use and very friendly user, display is clear and icons were easily identified, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nomis Bayan

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for teen or anyone powerful enough to run all apps well and has great battery life might not be as strong as much more expansive phones but hold its own
customer_reviews.author: M. Andrejco

customer_reviews.title: useless..
customer_reviews.text: Phone can't even hold 5 apps in internal memory....useless...display screen is very small
customer_reviews.author: Keely Watkins

customer_reviews.title: GOOOD PHONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is pretty darn good, I'm using it now to do this short review. Good battery, nice speed, no lag. If you download music be sure to move it to the micro SD to keep the phone storage up.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice phone
customer_reviews.text: What a deal! I purchased this because I've been pleased with LG quality in the past. Can't beat the price and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ForYourHealth

customer_reviews.title: decent cheap phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone suffers from a lack of storage space. It's highly annoying not to be able to install an app, especially when you have gigabytes of space on your sd card. On the positive side, the CPU is rather snappy, it has NFC, and it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C. Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing! It is just like an IPhone but it's affordable. I have had LG phones for years now and I have had this phone for about two weeks and I haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: AprThom

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I broke my LG Optimus V and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I broke my LG Optimus V and needed a replacement. I struggle with parting with my money, but this phone was well worth the $80 Fast, reliable, clear. Great phone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kemery

customer_reviews.title: I Don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really happy with this product.this is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sudi Jumapili

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Looks great. Very fast!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is very thin and light. The battery holds a good charge and the 4G/LTE makes web surfing very fast.
customer_reviews.author: webphil

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is an adequate phone That works as it is advertised
customer_reviews.author: james sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: First smart phone for me and its every thing that I need. Very user freindly and love the Task Manager - you can stop all the apps that are running. Battery has a good life and texting is easy. Phone is plenty fast but I don`t install a lot of apps that would slow me down. Browser works great so why install a memory hogging app.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Ollila

customer_reviews.title: Very cute phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone was a present for my boyfriend. He had a really old phone. Now with this one he can do everything; text go online, send emails and check emails. He really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Won

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Phone For Me
customer_reviews.text: Have this phone for less than a month. It doesbwhat I need. I am not a high end user so storage capacity complaints in some reviews are not an issue for me. Great battery life. Light weight. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: golfer B

customer_reviews.title: hola, alguien me puede ayudar o el vendedor de este producto
customer_reviews.text: Hi,can somebody help me so i bough this phone and it never power on, I charge the battery for two hours and still no light during charging. But anyway it arrived very quit. I wait...
customer_reviews.author: Fannie

customer_reviews.title: Lg Optimus F3
customer_reviews.text: This phone is fantastic, I love every bit of it, I had the former Lg optimus which was well above average. This phone can do nearly anything any phone can do, it's great. Battery lasts forever and never crashes.
customer_reviews.author: Timeceased

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is terrible in many ways. Here is a pros/cons list. Pros: -Battery is good. Cons: -Internal storage is horrible, and you cannot move apps to the SD without a root. -The camera is terrible, and the front facing camera is worse. -The Qslider feature on this phone is incredibly glitchy and pisses me off. -The screen is too small. - The ram is also horrible, good luck multitasking Shell out the extra cash for a better phone, Like the S3, the Volt, or an HTC.
customer_reviews.author: tyler jae smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can't use. I have to find a sim card before I can use
customer_reviews.author: devaun chandler

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money Dont Be Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Worthless i finally see why people pay top dollar for phones. I tried being cheap and buying this phone and it easily reverted me back to paying more for my buck
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisying for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for a little under $80 and for that prize, I consider it amazing. It has 4G, it runs smoothly... in fact the only problem I have with the phone is the storage capacity. 1.2 Gb is not enough space of my liking
customer_reviews.author: Martese Goosby

customer_reviews.title: LG Optimus F3
customer_reviews.text: This gift was for my Granddaughter and she was thrilled with it. She has it set up the way she wants it to be.
customer_reviews.author: snowbaby

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad phone
customer_reviews.text: Very slow and came with previously downloaded things so it took a while to free up space. It's supposed to be a new phone but don't know why it came like that
customer_reviews.author: John Polychrones

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Works great under a college students heavy usage, and has yet to give way. Personaly, the screen is plastic, which is nice for someone like me who seems to enjoy dropping their phone. Worst thing that has happend to it from 5 feet, is the battery falling out. Runs the newest version of andriod, so in theory it should be up to date for a while. I would highly reccomend this phone
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Light phone, excellent graphics, fast speed
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great! It's light, great graphics and fast internet connection. I didn't go with 5 stars because the speaker phone quality isn't the best, but the regular call quality is stellar. I would recommend this phone to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amie Gallen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have found this to be the easiest phone to use and work with. Love the light weight it has and calls are clear and fat facing is next to nothing. LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Anita Rayner

customer_reviews.title: The phone is terrible. I only had it for a month and ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is terrible. I only had it for a month and i already had to buy a battery. Plus is very slow, from the distriction it sounded like a good phone but i dont like it at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS CELLULAR PHONE. IT IS SO LIGHT WEIGHT AND THAT IS IMPORTANT TO ME. AS SOON AS I RECEIVED IT WENT AND BOUGHT A NO CONTRACT PLAN AND NOW I'M ENJOYING IT. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Rivera

customer_reviews.title: storage not the best but hey
customer_reviews.text: storage not the best but hey.......for the price I can deal with it. I just have to move a lot to my sd card.
customer_reviews.author: MeMe

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is really nice for the price given that it's cheaper here than on virgins website. It has some cool features like the android beam and facial recognition to unlock phone. Screen has a nice crisp bright look to it and streaming videos look nice on it. I was streaming WWE network and it looked almost as good as it does on my tv which is also lg. The complaints about the Apps to SD isn't really a problem because all you have to do is search and there are plenty of videos online that show you how to fix it. Another good lg product that is reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy J. Hastings Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any memory. I also can't use my sd card to save any of my apps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good phone overall it gets the job done for those who aren't looking for a business type phone. All apps that I've downloaded have run smoothly, not to mention the 4G is always connected and fast in my area I would definitely recommend this phone to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: heaven fell over me!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about two months, still working great! No crashes, stays charged longer... only one gig internal storage... which sucks.. so dont download so much apps!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

product_meta.title: LG Optimus F3 4G LTE Mobile Phone Black | Virgin Mobile
product_meta.description:
The speedy LG Optimus F3 4G LTE lets you share and post to your social feed in a flash. The QuickMemo feature, 1.2 GHz dual-core processor and 5MP camera allow you to quickly switch between apps and easily capture, personalize and share your latest obsessions.

 3G/4G LTE Network Fast surfing, messaging and downloading - that's the power of 3G. Enjoy blazing 4G LTE speeds where available while on the Sprint Network.

 Android 4.1.2 Jelly Bean Jelly Bean improves on the simplicity and beauty of Android 4.0, and introduces a new Google search experience on Android.

 1.2 GHz Dual-Core Processor Surf the web, launch apps and play games with some serious speed.

 4" Touchscreen Display with Corning Gorilla Glass 2 Puts your fingers fully in control of web surfing, picture viewing and more.

 5.0MP LED Flash Camera & Camcorder Snap vivid pics and clips with the 5MP primary camera/1080p full HD camcorder, or video chat on the front-facing .3MP camera.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars706 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
